definition: turned outward in an ungainly manner, an outward bevel around a door or window that makes it seem larger, move out of position
details:
adjective
- turned outward in an ungainly manner
= example: turned outward in an ungainly manner
noun
- an outward bevel around a door or window that makes it seem larger
verb
- move out of position
= synonyms: slip
- turn outward
= example: turn outward
= synonyms: turn out, rotate, spread out
- spread open or apart
= example: spread open or apart
